concept.title: Inserting rows and columns
concept.shortdesc: Instructions on how to insert rows and columns in an existing worksheet.

conbody.p: It often happens that you want to insert a row or a column somewhere in between data in a worksheet. The process is the same for rows and columns.

ol.li: Right click on the header of the row or column.

conbody.note: To insert multiple rows or columns, select the desired number of rows/columns, right click and choose Insert. Then the number will be inserted before the first row or column of the selection.
